text: Lee Jae-woo is a South Korean actor and model. He is known for his roles in dramas such as Hi Bye, Mama!, When the Camellia Blooms and Catch the Ghost. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
